action.name: simple-map-generator
action.code:
result = action('mole-map-generator', {'newmap':newmap}) if not result: warning('mole generator is not available, falling back to some stupid one') mapId = newmap.attr('id')
MIN_SIZE = 16 MAX_SIZE = 32 width = int(random()*(MAX_SIZE-MIN_SIZE))+MIN_SIZE height = int(random()*(MAX_SIZE-MIN_SIZE))+MIN_SIZE newmap.resize(width, height) # fill with floor for x in range(width): for y in range(height): newmap.createEntity({'class':'floor'}, x, y, 'ground') newmap.setExist(True)
# random fungie MIN_FUNGIE = 2 MAX_FUNGIE = 16 fungie = random()*(MAX_FUNGIE-MIN_FUNGIE)+MIN_FUNGIE
while fungie > 0: x = int(random()*width) y = int(random()*height) newmap.createEntity({'class':'fungus', 'hp':2}, x, y, 'monster') fungie -= 1
# random stairs x = int(random()*width) y = int(random()*height) newmap.createEntity({'class':'stairs', 'destination':mapId+1}, x, y, 'feature')
